text: If you are looking forward to creating great products that stand up to the expectations of the users then this specialization is worth a look. Learn to create great products by understanding the needs of the user, rapidly generating prototypes and evaluating design concepts. You will also have the chance to get hands-on and go from initial concept, through user research, ideation and refinement, formal analysis, prototyping, and user testing, applying perspectives and methods to ensure a great user experience at every step of the way.
